Item.Value: [Text:Why hello. I haven't seen you around here before, I'd have remembered. The name's $Character_8$ and believe me, it's a pleasure to meet you.]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$. Care to join me for a hot drink this evening?][Weather:Snowing]
[Text:Hello, $Name$. Enjoying the winter? You should come visit me at the tavern some time soon. I've got just the thing to ward off the cold.]
[Text:You're always running around. Don't you ever just take a break and relax? Try to take it easy sometimes, ok?][Default]
[Text:Off again $Name$? If you need to relax after, you know where I'll be.][Default]
[Text:There's something almost peaceful about the swamp, you know? It's a dreary place, but it's beautiful in its own way. We should go there some time.][Default]
[Text:Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?]
[Text:Hello, what can I do for you?][Selection:VillageTalk]
[Text:Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.]
[Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.]
